metadata.title: Build Audit Log UI Tab in Settings

context.background: This task implements Build Audit Log UI Tab in Settings for Healio and is scoped as one atomic work item aligned to the PRD. It should be completed within 40 mins and leave clear evidence for follow-on tasks.

design_constraints.constraint: Use Stripe-like frictionless workflows: create/edit actions should open centered modals or slide-out drawers instead of disruptive full-page forms.
Use a Viedoc-style bento layout: soft floating white cards on an off-white background for dashboards and dense data views.
Apply the Paper Replacement palette: app background near #F9FAFB, white cards, calm trustworthy accents (teal/sage/cerulean), and reserve red for critical alerts only.
Preserve high-legibility typography: clean sans-serif (Inter/SF Pro/Halyard), bold patient names, slate-gray secondary metadata.
Honor the one-click rule where applicable: keep the global + action for Add Appointment, Add Patient, and Create Invoice visible and easy to reach.
Add educational empty states with clear CTAs for first-time or empty datasets.

instruction.step: Implement the scoped changes for Build Audit Log UI Tab in Settings in the planned files (healio/components/settings/audit-log-card.tsx, healio/components/settings/audit-log-filters.tsx, healio/components/settings/audit-log-table.tsx, healio/app/(dashboard)/settings/page.tsx) while preserving the PRD-aligned project structure.
Apply validation, error handling, and consistent response/UI behavior so the task output integrates cleanly with existing helpers and patterns.
Wire integrations and dependencies for this task (endpoints: GET /api/v1/audit-logs) and keep tenant scoping/RBAC/security expectations intact where applicable.
Prefer in-context modal/drawer workflows, scannable bento cards, and educational empty states so the UI matches the requested Healio experience.
Verify keyboard/focus behavior, touch target sizing, and mobile responsiveness before marking the task ready.

validation_checklist.check: Exercise the related endpoint(s): GET /api/v1/audit-logs and verify response shape/status codes.
Run lint/typecheck or the smallest relevant test suite for the files changed by this task.
Manually verify desktop and mobile layouts plus focus/keyboard behavior for the primary interaction path.
Use Chrome DevTools MCP to verify the implemented UI in-browser (desktop + mobile), check interactions, inspect console errors, and capture a validation snapshot before marking done.
Capture a screenshot or short note confirming empty/loading/error states are present where applicable.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: The deliverable for Build Audit Log UI Tab in Settings is implemented in the referenced files and compiles without breaking adjacent modules.
Task output matches the PRD scope (Feature 10 Audit Log in Settings) and remains bounded to an atomic <=45-minute implementation chunk.
Related endpoint behavior returns the standard success/error envelope and respects auth/public route expectations for the route class.
UI states (loading, empty, error, success) are present and visually consistent with Healio bento cards, off-white background, and trust-oriented styling.
Interactions are keyboard accessible and usable on mobile without disruptive navigation when a modal/drawer workflow is appropriate.

execution_tracking.verification_command: npm run typecheck; Chrome DevTools MCP on http://localhost:4012/settings (audit-log filters/table desktop+mobile, console/network checks)
execution_tracking.verification_notes: Added an owner-only Audit Log bento card to the Settings workspace with filter controls (search + action), chain-integrity badge, paginated/filtered fetches to `GET /api/v1/audit-logs`, and empty/error/loading states. Verified in Chrome DevTools MCP with filter interactions, mobile responsiveness, and successful audit-log endpoint calls.

evidence.item: When work starts/completes, record changed files, test commands, screenshots (UI tasks), and commit/PR references here.
Chrome DevTools MCP desktop verification (`uid 32_*`, `31_*`): Audit Log card renders in Settings bento layout with filters, integrity badge, and seeded owner events.

Chrome DevTools MCP interactions: entered search term `invoice`, selected action `Invoice marked paid`, clicked card Refresh, and result list narrowed to a single matching entry (`Showing 1 of 1 entries`).
Chrome DevTools MCP mobile verification (390x844, `uid 36_*`): audit log card/filter controls remain usable and readable in the stacked settings layout.

Chrome DevTools MCP network verification: `GET /api/v1/audit-logs?page=1&pageSize=8` `200` and filtered `GET /api/v1/audit-logs?page=1&pageSize=8&q=invoice&action=INVOICE_MARKED_PAID` `200` (reqids 335/339/345).
Chrome DevTools MCP console check passed: `list_console_messages` returned no console messages.
Feature commit: 2a68654 (feat(healio-audit): audit log settings ui).
Include Chrome DevTools MCP evidence (snapshot/screenshot reference and notes on responsive + interaction checks) here before marking frontend tasks complete.
